使用方法

1. 选中 FRAME 图层

2. 运行插件

3. 将与选中图层名称相同的图层构建目录


How to use it

2. Run the plug-in

3. Build a catalog of layers with the same name as the selected layer

25593.description: Build color palette from hex colors in tailwind format

24799.name: Don't Need
24799.description:
"Delete for now!"

"Next time!"

"Pend!"

Have you ever been in a sad situation like this?

This is the perfect plug-in for you.


How to

Simply select the FRAMES or COMPONENTS you no longer need and choose between 'Deleted', 'Pending', and 'Moved'.

(If you would like to use different wording, simply select "Customize".)


-------------------


せっかく頑張って作ったのに

「この画面・機能一旦なしで」

「一旦ペンディングで」

という台無しな一言…


Don't Needはこんな場面にピッタリのプラグインです。


使い方

一旦必要なくなったFRAMEやCOMPONENTを選択して「Deleted」「Pending」「Moved」から選ぶだけです。

（もし、他の文言を使いたい方は「Customize」を選択して文言を入れるだけです。）

24791.name: EasyFramer
24791.description:
Easily wrap your selected components, media or texts on a frame.

Only select all the resources you need to be wrapped on a frame, then you can run the plugin.


If you are a developer feel free to send pull requests on github.

25589.name: Typograff
25589.description:
Typograf is a plugin-wrapper for original ArtLebedevs design studio eponymous typograf. Plugin solves multiple typographical errors automatically. Web typography is an essential aspect of modern design. Typograf Figma plugin automatically removes unnecessary spaces, adding non-breaking spacing between a word and a preposition, changing (C) character to © and countless other fixes.


There is a lot to build in this plugin, so if you find it useful and want it be more useful please donate

My card is 4274 3201 0756 2699

  • phase names
  • selection rectangle
  • generated background

manifest.name: Sur le pouce — thumbnail generator by User Studio

24945.name: DesignGo
24945.description:

Оставляй комментарии и рисунки прямо в макете, отслеживай все изменения.

25264.name: locize
25264.description:
What is locize?

﻿

locize is a new online service that offers true continuous localization. The translations are managed in your locize project and published from there to the locize CDN to be consumed from your application. The localization team can take care of the translations from the first day and keep up with changes with ease. The processes are separated. Translations can be updated without the need to release an update of your app. locize is bridging the gap between translation and development!


Best for


All involved in the software localization process: Developers, Designers, Team Leads, Heads of Engineering, Translation/Localization team, Product Managers, Project Leaders, Marketing, etc...

 

For more information please visit: https://locize.com

 

Why connect locize and Figma?

 

Bridging the gap between translation and design with locize, a modern and affordable localization-management-platform. It makes your website, app, game or whatever your project is, global, vibrant, and more engaging especially when unleashing the continuous localization capabilities.


Pushing texts from Figma to locize. Send first text content from within Figma to locize in seconds so that your Translators can start their work right away.

 

Try your designs in a different language by fetching other translations directly into Figma. Preview your designs in all your languages before handoff to Developers.

 

Increase your overall translation quality and reduce feedback loops.


How to set up

For more information and to learn how to install the plugin visit https://docs.locize.com/more/figma-plugin

Don’t have a locize account? Try it for free! https://www.locize.app/register

25529.name: BrandBird – Turn frames into beautiful social media posts
25529.description:
✨ The official Brandbird.app Figma plugin!

With BrandBird you can turn any image into a stunning social media post in seconds!


⚙️ How it works

It's pretty simple to use it:

  1. Pick an image or a frame
  2. Run the "✨ Open BrandBird" command
  3. Add cool backgrounds, 3D effects, device mockups, annotate the image, and many more
  4. Once you're satisfied with the result, hit the "Export to Figma" button, and the image will be imported on your canvas as a separate layer


⭐ BrandBird PRO

You don't need a BrandBird account to use the app. All our features are available for you and you can use them for free.


The only limitation for the free tier is the BrandBird watermark on the bottom right corner of the exported image.


To remove the watermark, and access all our advance features (save templates, custom watermark etc), you need a BrandBird PRO account.


Visit this link to learn more


🔗 How to connect your PRO BrandBird account

  1. Visit your BrandBird account page on the web
  2. Find and copy your unique personal API key
  3. Run the Figma plugin command "🔑 Set my API key" , paste your API key and hit save


☠️ Keep your API key safe and don't share it with anyone. If you believe that your API key is exposed in the public, please re-generate a new one.

manifest.name: BrandBird – Turn frames into beautiful mockups

25623.name: Figma ML
25623.description: A project using TensorFlow JS to create the spell check of design systems, that helps designers by keep-watching numerous design elements instead of humans.

25498.description:
Copy colors as CSS or Sass variables directly to your clipboard.


Support


https://github.com/thoughtbot/var-colors/issues

25258.name: Bitmap Tool
25258.description:
一些实用的位图功能


#### 位图等比缩放

快速将位图缩放至1倍、2倍等整数倍；


#### 精灵图裁剪

将 sheetpng 按行列裁剪成宽高相等的序列帧图片；


#### 切片转png

将带有导出选项的切片/形状等转成png，并自动添加到舞台上；



#### 选中切片生成gif

选中 切片/frame 等对象后快速生成gif；

图层名后加“#500ms”字样可以自定单帧的延迟；

gif序列帧先后顺序按图层层级排列；



#### 导入lottie序列帧

导入lottie动画到舞台，特别适合导入矢量动画到舞台；


#### 组件转画框

快速将 compent 转成frame
25258.release_notes: gif序列帧的前后顺序按图层层级前后处理

25518.name: ZapBG
25518.description:
The fastest way to remove backgrounds from images.


ZapBG is the easiest way to clear backgrounds from your images without having to go through hassle of using software or hiring anyone.


  • Upload image to ZapBG
  • Remove background in seconds and a color or new background
  • Simply save and share after image is Zapped

25389.name: Archetype to Figma
25389.description:
Import a harmonious typography design system to Figma with the Archetype to Figma plugin.


The Archetype to Figma plugin allows Archetype users (https://archetypeapp.com) to export their beautifully crafted typography design projects into Figma as reusable typography components. Components are generated in Figma to include all of the styling and spacing created in Archetype, so you can effortlessly move your Archetype typography designs into your Figma projects.


(Please note, the Archetype export to Figma is available for Pro Archetype subscribers. Please see https://archetypeapp.com/ for details).


About Archetype


Archetype lets designers and developers quickly and easily create consistent typography styling and spacing live, in the browser. These styles are all underpinned by established typographic best practices meaning less guesswork and more harmonious designs.


Archetype helps you create a design system of consistent, reusable components which can be easily implemented as your finished design is exported as developer-friendly CSS, to Figma, or Sketch.
